discourse_list.title: Stats on the State of Maker 05 - Increased debt ceilings bring lower utilization

content.content: Highlights Mint some Dai while you can! Increased debt ceilings have lowered the overall utilization of a number of different Maker Vault types. For a closer look at the utilization of different vaults, please check out MakerBurn.  Dai Dai Price: $1.002 Circulating Dai / Debt Ceiling / Utilization: 2,864,100,810 / 4,369,500,000 / 65.55% Total Collateral / Collateralization: 7,719,309,378 / 269.52% DAIly Active Addresses  Daily Active Addresses1899×705 99 KB  Source  Vaults Open Vaults: 22,108 Liquidations Initiated (3/13 - 3/19): 4 (3 complete, 1 in progress) Liquidation Details  MKR MKR Price: $2,092.28 MKR Supply: 995,238 MKR Burned (Total / Total Supply): 4,761.22 / 995238.78 Surplus Buffer (Now / To burn MKR / est’d time): 16,069,343.59 / 30,000,000 / 47.51 days Annual Burn (estimated): 49,256.38 MKR P/E: 22.17  Governance Executive Votes (Past week): 1 View Votes Governance Polls: 9 View Polls  More Stats? Thanks for checking out this update on the state and growth of Maker.  Feedback is appreciated!  Sources  https://dai.descipher.io/ Dai Stats DeFi Explore Graphs by Santiment makerburn.com vote.makerdao.com
